sentences: Ta on viimasel ajal v채ga haige olnud.
Viimasel kuul olid tema s천nad talle eriti t채htsad.
On 체sna tavaline, et inimesed viimasel eluaastal palju kaaluvad.
context: The word viimasel is an adjective in Estonian that means last or latest, and it is commonly used to describe something that has happened recently or is the most recent in a series of events.
